summary: An ordinance relating to and creating an indebtedness in the sum of Four Hundred Thousand ($400,000.00) Dollars; providing for a loan, and authorizing the issuance and sale of general negotiable bonds therefor, in said sum, for the purpose of paying the cost and expense of the construction of a public auditorium; providing for the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest of said bonds; and creating and establishing a construction fund and a bond interest and redemption fund.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
